programme.title: Newsline
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2023. NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2023. Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Japan From Above
programme.desc: French-Japanse production from 2018. JAPAN FROM ABOVE takes you on an aerial journey across Japan. Enjoy a bird's-eye view of Japan's amazingly diverse landscapes, as well as intimate portraits of people leading contrasting lives. Episode: Japan From Above: Up Close. This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2020 with Rachel Walzer among others. We follow Brazilian Ludmilla Hirata in her work as a doula to support expectant and nursing mothers in Shizuoka, as well as French-born Jeff Rudge, who makes traditional paper lanterns in Ibaraki.

programme.title: Newsline
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2023. NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2023. In 2022, Shinohara Tomoe's "The Leather Scrap Kimono" design won two awards at the prestigious ADC Awards in New York. She looks back on her career path and shares her passion for design.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2022. Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2020. Culture Crossroads comprises several regular programs with the theme of creating a multicultural society. They look at international exchange programs and give tips on disaster preparedness. Episode: As the invasion of Ukraine continues, a Russian reporter covers an anti-war-themed exhibition in Tokyo. She interviews participating artists, including a Ukrainian and a Belarusian, about their works.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2023. Episode: Dining with the Chef mini. Featured recipes: (1) Crispy Pork Stir-fry with Myoga and Green Beans (2) Stir-fried Eggplant and Shishito with Miso Sauce. Learn about Japanese home cooking with Chef Saito in five minutes!

programme.title: Newsline
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2023. NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2023. Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Seasoning The Seasons
programme.desc: Japanse production from 2012 with Tomohiro Nakano among others. This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Echizen - Taste of Winter.

programme.title: Nederlandse Filmacademie
programme.desc: Nederlandse production. Welcome to a showcase of the Talents of Tomorrow attending the Netherlands Film Academy in Amsterdam.

programme.title: Echoes Of The Volcano
programme.desc: Mexicaanse production from 2021 by directors Charles Fairbanks and Saúl Kak. A sonic portrait of a Chiapan village focused on architecture and public space. Filmed over six years, the film is a sensory ethnography of culture and communication in a community founded by volcano eruption refugees.

programme.title: Windemi - The False Dream Of Gold
programme.desc: Italian production from 2014 by director Sergio Panariello with WINDEMI OUEDRAGO among others. WINDEMI went away from his village to get to the mine Gold close to the village of Tougou in the northern region, knows the risks of dive to 60 meters deep, in holes dug in a completely rudimentary.

programme.title: The Ballad Of The Homeless
programme.desc: Italian production from 2015 by director MONICA MANGANELL with FRANCESCA DE ANGELIS among others. A poetic and surreal journey into the lands devastated by the earthquake in Emilia Romagna (2012), through the eyes of a child and his friends, a snail. Script: MONICA MANGANELL. Music: MASSIMO MORETTI.

programme.title: Paul & Lars
programme.desc: Mexicaanse production from 2019 by director Mauricio Ceballos Almada. Two polar bear brothers, Paul and Lars, are fishing on a small iceberg. While the little one, Paul, seems to be doing alright, things won't go exactly as they should once Lars tries to do some fishing himself. Script: Roberto González. Music: Aldo Andrés Rodríguez Flores.

programme.title: My Nephew Emmett
programme.desc: American production from 2017 by directors Kevin Wilson Jr and Kevin Wilson with Dane Rhodes, Jasmine Guy, Tylon Larry among others. Oscar nominated period drama from Kevin Wilson Jr. Mose Wright tries to defend his nephew from a pair of white men intent on lynching his fourteen-year-old nephew in late 50s Mississippi.

programme.title: Whole Lotto Love
programme.desc: Canadian production from 2016 by directors Chris Strikes and Chris Stikes with Dorly Jean-Louis, Frankie Agyemang, Matthew Willson among others. For the first time since separating, Lenore revisits her ex-husband Dwight in a covert search of a missing $52 million winning lottery ticket.

programme.title: The Water May Rise
programme.desc: Nederlandse production from 2020 with Marce l Romeijn, Iris van Geffen among others. A starkly intimate, multiple award-winning drama. A Dutch couple are escaping a flood during World War II on a boat, pushing their relationship to the brink.

programme.title: Volando Voy
programme.desc: Nederlands-Spanish production from 2015 by director Isabel Lamberti with Jesús Gabarre Mendoza, David Gabarre Men among others. Award-winning drama. A pair of brothers embark on a road trip as they live on the fringe of society.
